Subject: Inconsistency in thermal diff coeffs
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=183139631
X-Yahoo-Profile: niveditaah


Hi,

I have Cantera version 1.5.4. I recently noticed that when I get the 
thermal diffusion coefficients for GRI30 mech from MATLAB and compare 
it with the results obtained by running my C++ program, some of the 
values have opposite signs (i.e, +ve valued in one and -ve in the 
other). I cross checked this by running the transport 2 example in 
c++ for a temperature of 2000 K and gave the same input in MATLAB. I 
had 4 values that were inconsistent. What is to be done when such a 
situation props up?

Thanks,

Niveditha
